mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (reviewNo, uuid, beerNo, reviewContent, reviewPic, rating, regDate, likeCnt, cmtCnt) VALUES(seq_review_no.nextVal, #{uuid}, #{beerNo}, #{reviewContent}, #{reviewPic}, #{rating}, #{regDate}, 0, 0)
